summary: Game project with player leveling system. User wants significantly more XP required per player level-up.

existing_features.title: Update the frontend level progression system in `frontend/src/utils/levelSystem.ts` to mirror the new backend XP thresholds exactly, so that the displayed level, XP progress bar, and XP boundaries in the PlayerProfile screen remain consistent with backend calculations.

new_feature_requests.summary: Increase XP required for each player level-up significantly

Significantly increase the XP thresholds required to advance each player level in the backend XP/level progression system. The XP cost per level should scale much more steeply so players need considerably more accumulated XP to reach higher levels.
